column1: Local Foods////The dining area is nowhere near as inviting as Ruggles Green
column2: but as I mentioned from the outset
column3: Local Foods really feels more like a take to-go place anyway. If you want a fantastic sit-down ambiance
column4: I recommend heading next door to benjy's during happy hour. Your bill will likely come out cheaper
column5: to boot. But if you're digging the whole locally sourced craze
column6: Local Foods will tickle your fancy.
